meanings: massacre, annihilation, extermination, a wholesale murder[slaughter], 몰살하다 massacre, annihilate, exterminate, kill to a man, wipe out
exterminate the whole[entire] family of a traitor

examples.korean: The disease threatens to wipe out the entire population. 발음듣기 그 질병은 인구 전체를 몰살시킬 정도로 위협적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The disease threatens to wipe out the entire population. 발음

examples.korean: AIDS will decimate Africa if nothing is done. 발음듣기 어떤 조치도 취해지지 않는다면 AIDS는 아프리카를 몰살시킬 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: AIDS will decimate Africa if nothing is done. 발음

examples.korean: The Czar and all his generation were murdered in the revolution. 발음듣기 러시아 황제와 그의 모든 일가가 혁명 때 몰살되었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Czar and all his generation were murdered in the revolution. 발음

examples.korean: In time, it will weaken or destroy complete ant colonies. 발음듣기 시간이 지남에 따라 질병은 개미 떼를 약하게 만들고 완전히 몰살시킵니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In time, it will weaken or destroy complete ant colonies. 발음

examples.korean: In time, it will debilitated or destroy complete ant colonies. 발음듣기 시간이 지남에 따라 질병은 개미 떼를 약하게 만들고 완전히 몰살시킵니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In time, it will debilitated or destroy complete ant colonies. 발음
